entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
